title: July 27, 2000 - July 8, 2001
description: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar, founder of the Art of Living Foundation, is a spiritual leader and prominent humanitarian. His words of wisdom have given people solace, confidence, strength and clarity, and now this practical wisdom is available to everyone. Each week, Sri Sri sits with a group and composes a message which meets the need of the day. It then flows to all Art of Living groups around the world. This book is a compilation of the sixth year of these intimate notes of weekly knowledge from Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.
author: Ravi     Shankar
